name: ScientistoftheDay
0:
”Alexa open Scientist of the Day”
”Echo open Scientist of the Day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scientist of the day
des:
Learn more about science, with information on a new scientist for each day of the year.
You can ask Alexa, or with the use of routines, you can hear your "scientist of the day" at a specific time each day.
This is the first release of this skill so please leave a review if any bugs are encountered!
